data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Sud-Ubangi to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Sud-Ubangi prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Sud-Ubangi to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo.

data.focus_label: Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 871,100.

We estimate Sud-Ubangi has 167,445 people who might know Jesus, 630,892 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 72,762 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Sud-Ubangi
location.full_name: Sud-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo
